illustration

Illustration

About

With a strong focus on high contrast, my illustrations cover people, animals, objects, and nature.

As a big fan of minimalism, I also prefer using the limited color palettes to bring out simple but aesthetic features.

Areas

#illustration

#UI design

#storytelling

Sign-up form UI design

To bring more vitality to the sign-up form, I applied a sliding interface to swap between sign-in and sign-up.

I also used one of my illustrations as the form background image.

Be minimalist

I love illustrating animals especially cats, as in my heart I have a special place for those gentle creatures.

I also enjoy illustrating people, as they could be interactive in probably any scenario.
